short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download links from Chrome browser with MetaProducts Offline Explorer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the integration plug-in for MetaProducts Offline Explorer (http://www.metaproducts.com/mp/Offline_Explorer_Pro.htm.)
